entry.title: Stanford CS106L ç¬”è®°-lecture01
entry.content:
Stream I

ğŸ¥Š 2022/12/18 14:14

Contents

  • ostringstream
  • istringstream
  • bit state

EXï¼šwrite a function stringToInterger

stringstream

ostringstream

it is not connected to any external source. only type conversion.

The position started in the front, so we are overwriting the buffer.

if you use ostringstream(â€somethingâ€,ostringstream::ate); then it starts at end.

istringstream

input streams read up to the next whitespace

also skips any leading whitespace

bit state

good and bad good and fail are not opposites
